relevant_findings.general: Tenderness to palpation in epigastric region, guaiac negative.

relevant_findings.skin: Warm and well-perfused, no excoriations or lesions.
relevant_findings.cardiac: Regular rate and rhythm, S1/S2, no murmurs.
relevant_findings.lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes or crackles.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Nondistended, positive bowel sounds, tenderness to palpation in epigastric area, no rebound or guarding.
relevant_findings.neurological: Cranial nerves II-XII intact, strength and sensation intact.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Reported improvement of nausea and vomiting with medication.
